content: Given X : Set Î±, does mathlib provide a nice way to say âˆ€ a b c âˆˆ X, a â‰  b â†’ a â‰  c â†’ b â‰  c â†’ ...? I.e. to quantify over subsets of distinct elements of X?

There's docs#Set.Pairwise but not "triplewise" etc.
What you want may be docs#List.sublistsLen (there are Multiset and Finset versions too, but these require X to be finite).
Or âˆ€ f : Fin 3 â†’ X, f.Injective â†’ P (f 0) (f 1) (f 2)
